sqlMap.sql: SELECT table_id ,table_index ,CONVERT(CHAR(10), date_isusse,23) AS date_isusse ,vsl_row ,title ,out_port ,common_shipping ,company_abbr ,TS ,company_name ,gubun ,page ,agent ,quark_format ,port_col ,out_to_port ,in_to_port ,in_port ,othercell ,console_cfs ,d_time ,c_time ,console_page ,inland_indexs ,bookPage FROM TB_TABLE_INFO
sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.table_id, A.table_index, CONVERT(CHAR(10), A.date_isusse,23) AS date_isusse , A.vsl_row , A.title , A.out_port , A.common_shipping ,A.company_abbr , A.TS , A.company_name , A.gubun , A.page , A.agent , A.quark_format , A.port_col , A.out_to_port , A.in_to_port , A.in_port , A.othercell , A.console_cfs , A.d_time , A.c_time , A.console_page , A.inland_indexs , A.bookPage , B.data FROM TB_TABLE_INFO AS A LEFT JOIN TB_ADV_INFO AS B ON A.table_id = B.table_id
A.table_id = #table_id#
A.page = #page#
A.table_index = #table_index#
A.company_abbr = #company_abbr#
A.title = #title#
A.agent = #agent#
A.gubun = #gubun#
A.date_isusse=#date_isusse#
order by A.page, A.table_index

table_id = #table_id#
page = #page#
table_index = #table_index#
company_abbr = #company_abbr#
title = #title#
agent = #agent#
gubun = #gubun#
date_isusse=#date_isusse#
order by page, table_index

SELECT ROWNUM
,table_id ,table_index ,CONVERT(CHAR(10), date_isusse,23) AS date_isusse ,vsl_row ,title ,out_port ,common_shipping ,company_abbr ,TS ,company_name ,gubun ,page ,agent ,quark_format ,port_col ,out_to_port ,in_to_port ,in_port ,othercell ,console_cfs ,d_time ,c_time ,console_page ,inland_indexs ,bookPage
FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY page, table_index)
AS ROWNUM, * FROM TB_TABLE_INFO WITH (NOLOCK)
) T
WHERE T.ROWNUM BETWEEN (#PAGE_NO# - 1) * #PAGE_SIZE# + 1 AND #PAGE_NO# * #PAGE_SIZE#

select * from TB_TABLE_PORTLIST
port_type = #port_type#
table_id = #table_id#
order by port_index
sqlMap.insert: insert TB_TABLE_INFO( table_id, port_col, vsl_row, othercell, company_abbr, page, bookPage, table_index, out_port, out_to_port, in_port, in_to_port, agent, title, quark_format, common_shipping, gubun, console_cfs, d_time, c_time, console_page, inland_indexs, date_isusse ) values( #table_id#, #port_col#, #vsl_row#, #othercell#, #company_abbr#, #page#, #bookPage#, #table_index#, #out_port#, #out_to_port#, #in_port#, #in_to_port#, #agent#, #title#, #quark_format#, #common_shipping#, #gubun#, #console_cfs#, #d_time#, #c_time#, #console_page#, #inland_indexs#, CONVERT(date,GETDATE()) )
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM TB_TABLE_INFO WHERE table_index=#table_index# and company_abbr=#company_abbr# and table_id=#table_id#
DELETE FROM TB_TABLE_INFO WHERE table_index=#table_index# and company_abbr=#company_abbr# and table_id=#table_id#
sqlMap.update:
update TB_TABLE_INFO set table_id=#table_id#
port_col=#port_col#
vsl_row=#vsl_row#
othercell=#othercell#
page=#page#
bookPage=#bookPage#
quark_format=#quark_format#
title=#title#
company_abbr=#company_abbr#
agent=#agent#
table_index=#table_index#
company_name=#company_name#
common_shipping=#common_shipping#
out_to_port=#out_to_port#
in_to_port=#in_to_port#
out_port=#out_port#
in_port=#in_port#
gubun=#gubun#
gubun=#gubun#
console_cfs=#console_cfs#
console_page=#console_page#
inland_indexs=#inland_indexs#
c_time=#c_time#
d_time=#d_time#
date_isusse=#date_isusse#
where table_id=#table_id#

update TB_TABLE_INFO set
date_isusse=#date_isusse#
where table_id=#table_id#
sqlMap.insert: insert TB_TABLE_PORTLIST ( table_id, port_name, port_index, parent_port, port_type) values( #table_id#, #port_name#, #port_index#, #parent_port#, #port_type# )
